table.name: vtiger_issuecards
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_issuecards` ( `issuecardid` int(19) NOT NULL, `issuecards_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `pslip_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `issue_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `deliver_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `accid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ctoid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `invoicestatus` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `calle` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `poblacion` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `provincia` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `cpostal` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `pais` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adjustment` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `salescommission` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `exciseduty` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `subtotal` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `total` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `taxtype` varchar(25) DEFAULT '', `discount_percent` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `discount_amount` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_amount` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` varchar(19) DEFAULT '', `conversion_rate` decimal(14,3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`issuecardid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_issuecardscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_issuecardscf` ( `issuecardid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`issuecardid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
